title: Video: Wolf Alice – Blush
body:
Winner of Best Looking Band of the Year 2013 (an award I made up… NME will probably start awarding it next year), **Wolf Alice** have arguably written two of the best songs of recent years (Blush & Bros).

With this new video for _Blush_ they channel their inner drag queens, seemingly toying with and perhaps mocking the concept behind artists that have an overly sexualised lead singer. Still early in their career, and with a dozen or so solid tracks under their belts, Wolf Alice are sure to top numerous Sound of 2014 lists.
